items: Are logs emitted in a structured format (e.g., JSON)?
Do logs include correlation IDs to trace requests across services?
Are logs categorized by severity levels (DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR)?
Is sensitive information (PII, credentials) strictly excluded from logs?
Are logs aggregated in a central system (e.g., ELK, Splunk, Datadog)?
Are alerts configured for critical log patterns or error spikes?
